name: Two Marbles
description:
This is a simple puzzle game made for the 2020 United Game Jam. In this game you switch between control of two marbles with the goal of getting them through a series of puzzle based obstacle courses. All puzzles  are designed to require both marbles to be used together it get passed. This fits into the game jams theme which is simply the number two. This is a very short game do to the time restrains of the game jam and my extremely limited experience making games.

I am a beginner as defined by this game jam. However, in the interest of full disclosure I would like to point out that have made one other simple game before this that I haven’t uploaded to itch.io. This game was made with the Unity game engine.
